title: Avocado mayonnaise

ingredients.content: 240 g avocado, ripe, flesh only (approx. 1 avocado)

preparations.content: Place a jug onto mixing bowl lid, weigh sunflower oil into jug and set aside.

Place avocado, egg, lime zest, lime juice, mustard, salt and pepper into mixing bowl, emulsify <b>2 min 30 sec/speed 4<b> while slowly pouring reserved sunflower oil onto the mixing bowl lid, letting it drizzle around measuring cup in a thin stream onto rotating blades to create an emulsion.
Season avocado mayonnaise to taste, transfer to a bowl and chill until served.

hintsAndTricks: For best results, all ingredients and the mixing bowl should be at room temperature.
Only use ripe, soft avocados to avoid lumpy mayonnaise.

To fix mayonnaise that will not thicken or is too runny: transfer mayonnaise to a bowl. Add <b>1 further<b> egg to mixing bowl, emulsify again <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 4<b> by slowly pouring the liquid mayonnaise onto the mixing bowl lid and allowing it to drizzle down onto the rotating blades.
